mapper.select: select a.orderSeq ,a. orderRegDate ,a. orderModDate ,a. orderDelNy ,d.memberName ,d.memberTypeCd ,c.productName ,c.productPrice ,c.productTypeCd ,b.orderAccount from orders a left join orderProduct b on a.orderSeq = b.orderSeqF left join product c on c.productSeq = b.productSeqF left join member d on d.memberSeq = a.memberSeqF
